name: T1
func:
global.set("T1",msg.payload)
return msg;

name: T3
func:
global.set("T3",msg.payload)
return msg;

name: P1
func:
global.set("P1",msg.payload)
return msg;

name: P2
func:
global.set("P2",msg.payload)
return msg;

name: T1 > 70   -   R1-ON
Relay
driver - driverf - driverg
func:
global.set("driver",0)
global.set("driverf",false)
global.set("driverg",false)
return msg;

name: set driver  "5"
R2-ON
R2-OFF
func:
var data = msg.payload
if (data === true) {
    global.set("R2",true)
    global.set("temp1",true)
    global.set("temp2",true)
    global.set("temp3",true)
    global.set("pres1",true)
    global.set("pres2",true)
    msg.payload = true
    return msg;
    
}

name: set "0" (T1 - T3 - P1 - P2 - P2S - PS )
func:
global.set("T1",0)
global.set("T3",0)
global.set("P1",0)
global.set("P2",0)
global.set("P2S",0)
global.set("PS",0)

return msg;

name: T3 < 50
msg.payload = P2

func:
global.set("PS",14);
return msg;

global.set("number",msg.payload)
return msg;

name: T3<100 & P1<10 & P2<25
sensor
func:
global.set("sensor",false)
return msg;

var temp = global.get("T3")
var pres = global.get("P2")

switch (temp) {
    case temp < 50 :
        msg.payload = true
        global.set("driver",14)
        return msg
        break
    
    case temp > 50 :
        msg.payload = false
        global.set("driver",16)
        return msg
        break
    
}
return msg;

name: T3 < 100
P1 < 10
P2 < 25

func:
global.set("value", undefined)
global.set("address", 0)
global.set("fc", 6)
return msg;

name: Set modbus1
func: global.set("modbus1", msg.payload)

msg.reset = true
return msg;
